page.content: Since 1939-45 war{tourism increased.} {Burton Hall.}pre-war fishing hotel now a Snooker club following efforts to re-establish it as hotel.{Â£120,000}is required today to purchase, install statutory fire precautions and furnish but would not provide sufficient guaranteed return.{Present trend}is for{self-catering}or{farm holidays.} Furnished accomodation for 2-10 people cost from Â£60-150 per week. Farmhouse accomodation available at 25% of hotel costs, providing home cooking in a relaxed family atmosphere, and fun of participation in farm pursuits. Typical{farmhouse menu}will consist of homemade soup, roast meat, often home produced, fresh fruit/vegetables from farm garden, Devon clotted cream (cream from scalded milk) and Junket. Profits are usually considered part of {wifes income.}
